entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 6:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -17.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -20.3°C
Wind: W 34 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed areas. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed areas in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
